name.description: Service name for the rest-proxy instance(s)

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each rest-proxy instance.

mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each rest-proxy instance.

heap.description: JVM heap allocation (in MB) for rest-proxy task; should be ~256MB less than total memory for the instance.

role.description: Deploy rest-proxy only on nodes with this role.

kafka-service.description: Target Apache Kafka by Confluent service to which these tasks will connect.

zookeeper-connect.description: Zookeeper Connect string for service cluster. Format is comma-separated list of <zk-host>:<zkport>/<kservice>

schema-registry-service.description: Schema Registry service to be used by REST Proxy workers. The named VIP associated with this service will be used to specify the converter-schema-registry-url's
